dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm still a soldier.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: When was the last time you shot a guy?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What, if I haven't shot a guy in 15 years then I'm not a soldier? City hall don't insist I bring along a fucking bullet- ridden corpse every five years to renew my soldier licence.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You know this is an unnecessary war. It's a war you don't believe in. Show me some balls, George.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know I've got balls, I don't need to show them to you. Page 118 119   CON TINUE D: (2)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Simon, look, mate. Listen to me. You still don't need to resign.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. I'm going to resign, Malcolm. In a hour. You can't stop me now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Boss?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's on the BBC News website -- Partial collapse of the wall. Mrs Michaelson's greenhouse has a smashed pane. The BBC had a crew down there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: God, and that's NEWS. Ridiculous, isn't it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's nor Ridiculous. You're fired.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The wall. It's just not tolerable.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's just a fucking wall.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Look at this. (clicks his fingers at Toby) Give me the paper. (off Simon's look) He's my new boy. I'm just breaking him in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Here. Page 120 120   CON TINUE D: (2)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .J. (CONT'D) I should be out there having a youth. Getting high, making women pregnant. 124   INT. DFID - DAY                                                124
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ah, here they are. Minister. Elizabeth. Welcome aboard.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thanks Malcolm. Looking forward to it. War seems to be going `great guns' at the moment.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ah, cheeky! Let me take you out for an expensive lunch, roast swan and all the trimmings, and I'll bring you up to speed on the whole Middle East situation.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Are you twisting my arm already?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Aye, but in a friendly, non-breaky way. Watch your step there. There's still blood on the deck.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Judy) Hi I'm Danny. Dan. I'm Elizabeth's chief advisor.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Judy Molloy. Senior Press -
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Have I got a desk?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, it's that one there.
dialogue.name: dialogue
